27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Mas'ud [Al-Ansari] said:"I was beating a slave of mine and I heard someone behind me saying: 'Beware O Abu Mas'ud! Beware O Abu Mas'ud!' So I turned around and saw that it was the Messenger of Allah. He said: 'Allah has more power over you than you do over him." Abu Mas'ud said: "I have not beaten any slave of mine since then

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ ضَرْبِ الْخَدَمِ، وَشَتْمِهِمْ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Beating And Abusing The Servant
